string.text:
A simple but durable ceramic bowl.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A ceramic plate of the non-combat variety.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

Also known as a waterpipe or arghile, this instrument is used for smoking Shisha Tobacco in which the smoke is cooled by water held within its base.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An old keyboard that has developed a faint yellow tint due to the passage of time.

 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An old monitor in decent condition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A basic, old PC mouse. Welcome back to late 90s.

 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

Basic, old PC mouse with a mouse pad. Welcome back to late 90s.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An old sofa in surprisingly good shape.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

An old PC case. The computer within is non-functional. Still neat to look at.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A small, functional fan. Useful for those rare sunny days in the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Placeable

A sturdy wooden bed. The mattress is soft and comfortable. Comes with a double set of blankets to keep you warm during cold nights.
